fields.name: Love Burns
fields.description: Love Burns is a new hot sauce with Carolina reapers, 7 pot primos, trinidad scorpion and ghost pepper…a superhot sauce with flavor.
fields.ingredients: Red 7 Pot Primo pepper mash (Red 7 Pot Primo Peppers and vinegar), Reaper pepper mash (Reaper peppers, vinegar), Trinidad Scorpion pepper mash (Trinidad Scorpion Peppers, salt), lime juice, carrots, onions, apple cider vinegar, water, garlic, carrot concentrate, ghost chile powder

fields.name: Ultimate Insanity
fields.description: Dave's Gourmet Ultimate Insanity Sauce offers a heat experience that is even hotter than Insanity, yet doesn’t back down in flavor. Jamming smoky Red Savina Habaneros into his original Insanity, Dave has crafted a sauce that will blow your mind and burn your taste buds. Experience your chili, wings, burgers, and pizza one drop at a time with insane heat and ultimate flavor.
fields.ingredients: Red Habaneros, Water, Hot Pepper Extract, Cane Vinegar, Tomato Paste, Salt, Onions, Garlic, Acetic and Citric Acids (Acidity Regulators), Xanthan  Gum (Thickener).

fields.name: Ghost Pepper Jolokia Sauce
fields.description: Dave's Gourmet Ghost Pepper Jolokia Sauce is so hot it’s spooky! This sauce haunts palates with its slightly fruity and savory hot chili pepper flavor. Possessing a deceptive heat that slowly creeps up on you and won’t let go. It makes a grave addition to stews, wings, potato salad, or any other food that could use some frightful spice one drop at a time!
fields.ingredients: Ghost Pepper/Naga Jolokia, hot pepper extract, salt, vegetable oil, roasted garlic pulp, acetic acid.

fields.name: Funken Hot
fields.description:
Sparks will fly when you sample this funkaliscious groove on this sauce made with home grown 7 Pot Brown and Chocolate Habanero chiles.
A thumping hot bass line mixes with aromatic Instant Karma for an epic flavor jam.
Spin this on your favorite foods and you won’t stop till you hit the bottom of the bottle.
fields.ingredients: hot brown pepper, organic sugar, apple cider vinegar, fresh lime juice, salt, garlic, spices EXTRA HOT

fields.name: Blackberry Chipotle
fields.description: This sweet & smoky blackberry chipotle hot sauce is ideal for grilled meats, Tex-Mex dishes and even desserts. National Chilli Awards 2023 Bronze Winner! Judges Comments: Nice, glossy appearance. Big blackberry notes with a pleasing sweetness upfront.
fields.ingredients: Water, sugar, Blackberries (15%), Chipotle (4%), and Jalapeño peppers, balsamic vinegar (contains sodium metabisulphite E223), salt, thickeners: modified cornstarch E1422 and xanthan gum E415, garlic, artificial smoke and blackberry flavouring.

fields.name: Beyond Insanity
fields.description:
Lab-tested at 135,600  Scoville Units – one of the hottest sauces on the planet.
Warning! This sauce is extremely hot.
Keep out of reach of children.
Consume one drop at a time with extreme caution.
fields.ingredients: Habanero peppers (Habanero, Salt), Chipotle puree (Chipotles, water, salt, citric acid), water, orange juice concentrate, natural pepper flavoring, tomato paste, potassium sorbate and sodium benzoate (to preserve freshness).

fields.name: Hot Habanero Sauce
fields.description:
This unique carrot-based blend achieves the perfect balance between flavour and heat.
Nestled in the foothills of the Mayan Mountains, Marie Sharp’s factory still creates products the old-fashioned way: using the freshest vegetables and the finest ingredients. Her secret homemade recipe utilizes the potent red habanero pepper.
Produced in the fertile paradise of Belize, her red habanero is considered to be the hottest variety of pepper known to man, Marie has spent many years cultivating a habanero worthy of her recipe.
fields.ingredients: Select red habanero pepper, vinegar, fresh carrots, salt, onions, lime juice and garlic.

fields.name: Bajan Pepper Sauce
fields.description:
Each bottle contains 18.5% yellow scotch bonnet chillies which delivers that distinctive scotch bonnet aroma and fruitiness we all know and love. It’s a versatile sauce which compliments most foods, but particularly lends itself to stews, meats and fish.
Daddy Cool would even go as far as putting it on breakfast cereal but that’s arguably a step too far for most.
fields.ingredients: Spirit Vinegar, Water, Scotch Bonnet Chilli (18.5%), White Onion, Yellow MUSTARD ( Water, MUSTARD Flour (22%), Sugar, Spirit Vinegar, Salt, MUSTARD Bran (3.5%), Turmeric, Rapeseed Oil, Preservative (Potassium Sorbate), Stabiliser (Xanthan Gum)), Brown Sugar, Garlic, Curry Powder (Coriander, Turmeric, Cumin, Iodised Salt, Chilli, Fenugreek, Ajowan, Black Pepper, Garlic Powder), Turmeric, Salt, E415.

fields.name: Kolohekid! Hot Sauce
fields.description: KoloheKid is made with Ghost Peppers and cut with Hawaiian Chili Peppers. The heat is there but it’s a slightly tamer version with layers of depth and flavor.
fields.ingredients: Apple Cider Vinegar, Ghost Peppers, Sea Salt, Garlic

fields.name: Habenero Hot Sauce
fields.description:
This Habanero Hot Sauce is an original family recipe that is all flavor. Tia Lupita combines just the right amount of heat balanced with the natural sweetness of each fruit. 

Handmade, in small batches, using just a few all natural ingredients, including habanero peppers, dates, mangos and spices. All ingredients are sourced from local farms, and are non-GMO and gluten-free certified. No added sugar!

Use as a condiment with breakfast burritos, eggs, sandwiches, tacos, pulled pork, steak, chicken, fish, quesadillas, and more.
fields.ingredients: Water, Carrots, Onion, Distilled Vinegar, Fresh Habanero Peppers, Organic Date Syrup, Canola Oil, Mangos, Salt, Garlic, Black Pepper, Red Bell Peppers, Oregano, Cumin, Habanero Powder, Turmeric

fields.name: Los Calientes Rojo
fields.description: Applewood smoked red jalapeños lend sweetness while added citrus and an extra handful of habanero up the heat factor. A unique mix of herbs and tart apricot give this sauce its signature flavor with increased nuance for an unforgettable condiment.
fields.ingredients: Peppers (Smoked red jalapeno, habanero), apricot (ascorbic acid and citric acid added), apple cider vinegar, agave nectar, lemon juice, tomatillo, water, garlic, salt, toasted onion, cumin, culantro, black pepper, thyme, celery seed

fields.name: Original Red Sauce
fields.description:
A classic!
Since 1868, TABASCO® brand Original Red Sauce has been handcrafted with just three ingredients: aged red peppers, salt and distilled vinegar. This simple recipe produces a unique pungent flavor that works with just about any cuisine. Gluten free, with zero calories and less sodium than other pepper sauces,
fields.ingredients: Distilled vinegar, red pepper, salt

fields.name: Zing
fields.description:
Zing, is Mikey V's mildest sauce, but is sure a crowd favourite! 
Using a mild, red pepper, and fresh garlic, mixed with sugar and vinegar, this versatile sauce can be used as a glaze or dipping sauce.
fields.ingredients: Distilled Water, Sugar, White Vinegar, Red Fresno Peppers, Fresh Garlic, Salt, Xanthan Gum.

fields.name: Jalapeno & Green Apple
fields.description: Granny Smith apples blended with only the freshest peppers and garlic. This isn't your typical "green" sauce; it's a game changer.
fields.ingredients: Green Apple, Poblano Pepper, Jalapeño, White Wine Vinegar, Garlic, Sea Salt

fields.name: Dill-licious Dill Pickle Hot Sauce
fields.description: Dill-Licious is a flavorful combination of dill pickles, garlic, and onions.  This sauce pairs well with hot dogs, hamburgers, potato salad, & deviled eggs
fields.ingredients: Tomatillos, Dill pickles (fresh cucumber, water, vinegar, contains less than 2% of salt, calcium chloride, natural dill flavor, gum Arabic, tumeric extract, (color) natural garlic flavor) red onions, garlic, lime juice, extra virgin olive oil, scorpion pepper mash (scorpion pepper, distilled vinegar) dill weed

fields.name: Spicy Dill Pickle Almonds
fields.description: Each crunchy almond packs a zesty punch that will leave your taste buds tingling. Packed with savory garlic and vinegar seasonings that can be described as nothing short of dill-licious, you’ve got to try them for yourself.
fields.ingredients: Almonds, spicy dill seasoning (corn maltodextrin, salt, sugar, dextrose, malic acid, white vinegar powder [corn maltodextrin, white distilled vinegar], citric acid, dehydrated dill, garlic powder, onion powder, natural flavoring (including chili pepper), acetic acid), vegetable oil (almond, canola, safflower and/or sunflower).

fields.name: Ninja Teriyaki
fields.description: Fried corn snack product with amazing teriyaki sauce flavor. Takis Teriyaki is the more "oriental" version of these famous spicy Mexican snacks that delight lovers of spicy food.
fields.ingredients:
Corn flour, vegetable fat (palm), teriyaki flavor prepared seasoning [sugar, spices, flavor enhancers (monosodium glutamate, disodium 5'-ribonucleotides), salt, corn maltodextrin, natural flavoring, fructose, acidity regulators ( citric acid, sodium acetates, malic acid), flavorings, vegetable oil (rape), coloring (papper extract)] Vegetable oil (sunflower).
May contain milk and/or soy.

fields.name: Chilli Peanuts
fields.description:
Spicy Chilli Flavour Peanuts
Packaged in a protective atmosphere.
fields.ingredients: Peanuts, Spicy Chilli Flavour [Natural Flavourings, Yeast Extract, Salt, Maltodextrin, Dried Onion, Chilli Powder, Spices, Dried Tomato, Dried Garlic, Colour: Paprika Extract, Acid: Citric Acid, Natural Chilli Flavourings], Sunflower Oil

fields.name: Wasabi Coated Green Peas
fields.description:
Wasabi coated green peas
Crunchy with medium spice.
Delicious!
fields.ingredients: Green Peas 62%, Glutinous Rice Flour 14%, Wheat flour 6%, Palm oil 5%, Sunflower oil 1.10%, Sugar 4.8%, Horseradish (Wasabi) 6%, Salt 1.10%, FD&C Yellow #5(E1022), FD&C Blue (E133)

fields.name: Buldak Carbo Hot Chicken Flavor
fields.description: Samyang Carbo Hot Chicken Flavor Ramen is a variety of Samyang’s original Buldak Bokkeum Myeon noodles, one of the spiciest and hottest Korean noodles, which is also called ‘Korean fire noodles’. The Carbo Hot Chicken Ramen from this brand is available in a 130g packet and it features the flavour of Italian hot pasta called Carbonara. Though it is less spicy compared to the original hot chicken ramen, still it is spicy enough to blow your head off.
fields.ingredients:
Noodles 77.5%: Wheat Flour, Modified Tapioca Starch, Refined Palm Oil, Modified Potato Starch, Refined Salt, Glycerin, Soybean Oil, Thickener (Guar Gum E412), Purified Water, Emulsifier ( Lecithin E322), Acidity Regulator( Potassium Carbonate Anhydrous E501, Sodium Carbonate E500, Sodium Phosphate Dibasic E339, Citric Acid E330), Green Tea Flavour Oil
Soup 12.7%: Whole Milk Powder, White Sugar, Milk Powder, Salt, Mozzarella Cheese Powder, Butter Powder, Modified Potato Starch, Parsley Curly, Pepper Powder, Garlic Powder, Soybean Oil
Flake 9.8%: Water, Soy Sauce, White Sugar, Artificial Chicken Flavour Powder, Artificial Chicken Flavour, Red Pepper Powder, Chilli Pepper Powder, Soybean Oil, Onion, Red Pepper Seed Oil, Garlic, Modified Potato Starch, Paprika Extract, Decolorized Chilli Extract, Black Pepper Powder, Curry Powder

fields.name: Crunchy XXTRA FLAMIN' HOT Cheese Flavored Snacks
fields.description: Turn up the heat with extra hot, spicy flavor packed into crunchy, cheese snacks
fields.ingredients: Enriched Corn Meal (Corn Meal, Ferrous Sulfate, Niacin, Thiamin Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Vegetable Oil (Corn, Canola, and/or Sunflower Oil), Xxtra FLAMIN' HOT® Seasoning (Salt, Maltodextrin [Made From Corn], Sugar, Yeast Extract, Monosodium Glutamate, Citric Acid, Artificial Color [Red 40 Lake, Yellow 6 Lake, Yellow 6, Yellow 5], Sunflower Oil, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Cheddar Cheese [Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes], Onion Powder, Whey, Natural Flavor, Garlic Powder, Whey Protein Concentrate, Buttermilk, Corn Syrup Solids, Sodium Diacetate), and Salt

fields.name: Fuego Tortilla Chips
fields.description: Takis Fuego Spicy Chili Pepper and Lime Rolled Tortilla Chips explode with a multitude of flavours in every bite. Each crisp and crunchy piece of rolled tortilla delivers a blast of flaming hot chili pepper and tangy lime that tingles your taste buds. These spicy corn chips are sure to thrill chip lovers, but beware—once you’ve tried Takis, ordinary snack foods will never compare.
fields.ingredients:
Corn Flour,Vegetable Oil (Soybean And/Or Canola ) And Palm Oil (Palm Oil And/Or Fractionated Palm Oil), Seasoning [Corn Maltodextrin, Sugar, Citric Acid, Potassium Choride, Rice Flour, Salt, Monosodium Glutamate, Natural And Artificial Flavours (Corn Maltodextrin, Yeast Extract, Monosodium Glutamate, Disodium Inosinate And Guanylate, Potato Starch, Gum Arabic), Hydrolyzed Soybean Protein, Dehydrated Onion, Spice Extractives (Including Red Chili Pepper), Sodium Bicarbonate, Colours, Disodium Inosinate And Guanylate, Sodium Acetate, Soybean Oil, Acetic Acid, Bha And Silicon Dioxide.Contains Barley Gluten.], Water.

May Contain:Peanuts, Milk, Egg, Wheat, Sulphites And Mustard.

fields.name: Insane Ghost Chilli Peanuts
fields.description:
Hand made in the Chilli Wizards Kitchens to make the perfect snack and flavoured to our own Louisiana Creole Seasoning recipe. NOT for the faint hearted.

These peanuts are surely the perfect molten snack for the hardened chilli head

Not your average boring bar snack

These painfully hot peanuts have been generously coated with a Louisiana Ghost Pepper Chilli mix and if you value your taste-buds even in the slightest, we wouldn't recommend shovelling handful after handful into your mouth

Make no mistake, these nuts are very very hot and will be a fantastic addition to any chilli heads most wanted list
fields.ingredients: Peanuts, Rapeseed Oil, Salt, Ghost Pepper Powder, Spices, Herbs, Onion, Garlic, Paprika, Cayenne

fields.name: 3xSpicy Bulkdak Noodle
fields.description:
Samyang 3x Spicy Hot Chicken Ramen will leave you burning from your lips all the way down. Samyang are renowned for their spicy ramen noodles and this is there hottest one yet!

Samyang has created their hottest spiciest ramen ever with this limited edition 3x spicy Chicken Ramen Noodles.
fields.ingredients:
NOODLES: Wheat flour, modified tapioca starch, refined palm oil, refined salt, emulsifier, acidity regulator (E501), sodium carbonate (E500), Sodium phosphate (E339), citric acid (E330), thickener (E412), green tea flavor oil.

SOUP: Water, Soy Sauce, White sugar, artificial chicken flavor powder, artificial chicken flavor, chilli pepper powder, soybean oil, decolorized chilli extract, red pepper powder, onion, flavor enhancer (E621), garlic, modified potato starch, paprika extract, black pepper powder, curry powder.

FLAKES: roasted sesame, roaster laver

fields.name: Reapers Gummy Bears
fields.description: Rummy Bears Reapers Gummy Bears are super, super-hot Carolina Reaper and 9 Million SHU Chilli extract infused Gummy Bears for the true heat seeking enthusiast!
fields.ingredients: Gelatin, Corn Syrup, Sugar, Water, Citric Acid, Natural Fruit Flavouring, Coconut Oil. Reaper Sauce Ingredients: Carolina Reaper Chilli fresh and dried, 9M SHU Chilli Extract, Chilli Powder, Vinegar, Garlic, Onion, Tomato Paste, Salt, Pepper
